Key Features

Laragon uses native service binaries and OS-level optimizations, resulting in extremely low RAM and CPU usage.

Ultra Fast

Lightning-fast startup times and optimized performance for seamless development.

Portable

Run Laragon from any location without installation. Perfect for USB drives.

Flexible

Easily switch between PHP, MySQL, Apache, and Nginx versions with a single click.

Pretty URLs

Automatically creates virtual domains like app.test instead of localhost/app. Professional and easy to remember.

Integrated CMDER

Comes with a powerful built-in terminal supporting git, ssh, ls, and more, enabling a professional workflow.

Mail Catcher

Preview outgoing emails locally, avoiding accidental test emails sent to real customers.

Powered by Best-in-class Technology

PHP Node.js Python Go Ruby MySQL Nginx Apache
